TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlAttributeProperties extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi sealed XmlAttributeProperties extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装 的 XML 语言特定的特性。

span.span: Encapsulates the XML language-related attributes of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现 、、和的附加属性支持 。This class implements attached property support for , , and and . 这些属性通常仅供和的 WPF XAML 分析器实现使用 [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] 。These properties are generally only used by the WPF XAML parser implementation for [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]. XAML 标记中实际的用户代码附加属性调用并不是主要方案。Actual user code attached property calls from XAML markup is not the primary scenario. 属性主要作为附加属性实现，以便属性可以更好地支持通过所有可能的对象图实现的依赖属性的属性继承概念。The properties are implemented as attached properties primarily so that the properties can better support the property inheritance concept for dependency properties through all possible object graphs. 因此，这实际上是一个基础结构支持类。As such, this is really an infrastructure support class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[属性值继承](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/property-value-inheritance)。For more information, see [Property Value Inheritance](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/property-value-inheritance).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个附加属性值，该附加属性值存储供适用于 .NET Framework 3.0 和 .NET Framework 3.5 的 WPF XAML 分析器使用的 XML 命名空间映射。

span.span: Gets or sets an attached property value that stores XML namespace maps for use by the WPF XAML parser for .NET Framework 3.0 and .NET Framework 3.5.
